parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The transmission slipping or harsh shifting can cause the vehicle to lose power, hesitate, or stall, leading to a loss of control, accidents, or stranded vehicles.
symptoms: The transmission shifts harshly or jerks
the vehicle hesitates or stalls when shifting
the transmission slips or refuses to engage
the vehicle slows down or loses power when accelerating.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The transmission disengaging or popping out of gear can cause the vehicle to lose power, hesitate, or stall, leading to a loss of control, accidents, or stranded vehicles.
symptoms: The transmission disengages or pops out of gear
the vehicle slows down or loses power when accelerating
the transmission reverts to neutral unexpectedly
the vehicle hesitates or stalls when shifting.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The transmission failing to respond or engage can cause the vehicle to lose power, hesitate, or stall, leading to a loss of control, accidents, or stranded vehicles.
symptoms: The transmission refuses to respond or engage
the vehicle slows down or loses power when accelerating
the transmission hesitates or stalls when shifting
the vehicle fails to accelerate in a lower gear.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the cooling system can cause the engine to overheat, leading to damage to the engine and other components, and potentially causing a breakdown or accident.
symptoms: The vehicle overheats
the temperature gauge rises
the coolant level drops
the water pump and thermostat need to be replaced frequently.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The unintended movement of the vehicle can cause accidents, injuries, or fatalities, especially if the vehicle is not occupied or if pedestrians are in the vicinity.
symptoms: The vehicle rolls away unexpectedly
even when turned off and locked
the vehicle moves without warning
the vehicle crashes into objects or people.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Engine oil leaks can cause damage to the engine and surrounding components, leading to costly repairs and potentially causing the engine to fail, which can result in a loss of power and control while driving.
symptoms: Smoke coming from underneath the hood
oil warning light illuminating
oil leaking from turbochargers and engine block.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Cooling system failures can cause the engine to overheat, leading to damage to the engine and surrounding components, and potentially causing the engine to fail, which can result in a loss of power and control while driving.
symptoms: Overheating problems
frequent replacement of thermostat.
